item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0032; 12:50AM; 7816 S Flight Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Bt2VZh; Westchester; Firefighters found smoke coming from attic vents upon arrival. Crews forced entry and developed hose lines on the ground, as others made their way to the roof. A coordinated attack by 30 firefighters extinguished the flames in one room (with some extension into the wall and attic) in 17 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E263 E295 E5 E51 E95 RA5 RA95 T5 T63 T95; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0032; 12:33AM; 7816 S Flight Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Bt2VZh; Westchester; One-story home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E295 E5 E95 RA5 RA95 T5 T95; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1383; 08:37PM; 240 E 57th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gTBrm9; South Park; Seventy-four LAFD firefighters battled a blaze in a one-story commercial blaze containing a marijuana grow operation. After firefighters transitioned back to defensive operations, there was a partial roof/mezzanine collapse inside, where debris initially hindered firefighters from fully extinguishing all hot spots within the rubble. LAFD USAR specialists on scene provided expertise for firefighters to safely and cautiously move into position to finish extinguishing the remaining burning materials. Firefighters achieved final extinguishment 84 minutes after the time of alarm. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 CM32 E14 E15 E203 E21 E211 E221 E233 E266 E3 E33 E46 E64 E66 EA1 EM11 FP354 HR3 JT6 RA21 RA33 RA833 RA846 SQ21 T11 T21 T3 T33 T66 UR3 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#1383; 07:26PM; 240 E 57th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gTBrm9; South Park; Additional units have been requested. Firefighters on the roof created ventilation holes. Smoke conditions have intensified and now heavy fire showing through the roof. The incident commander ordered crews off the roof and out of the structure, transitioning to defensive mode (fighting the fire from the exterior only). Crews are setting up ladder pipe operations.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 CM22 E14 E15 E203 E21 E221 E233 E266 E3 E33 E46 E66 EM11 HR3 RA21 RA833 RA846 SQ21 T21 T3 T33 T66 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1383; 07:13PM; 240 E 57th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gTBrm9; South Park; Flames appear to have spread from an adjacent auto fire into a one-story commercial building. Offensive mode.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E14 E221 E233 E33 E46 E66 RA21 RA833 RA846 SQ21 T21 T33; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0489; 10:20AM; 519 N Mariposa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BsbCTL; East Hollywood; Thirty LAFD firefighters extinguished flames in one ground-floor unit of a two-story garden-style apartment building in 19 minutes (10:39am). The fire appeared to have started outside behind the structure and extended inside. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 E11 E211 E220 E229 E3 E6 RA20 RA827 T20 T29; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Police Standby; INC#0386; 09:03AM; 6537 W Selma Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sJQV1B; Hollywood; LAFD firefighters and paramedics are on standby with LAPD (Inc #1002). MOTORISTS: Streets Closures - Hollywood Blvd (and parallel streets north and south of Hollywood Blvd) closed from Cherokee Ave to Wilcox Ave. Seek alternate routes to avoid delays. ; FS 27; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 RA27 T27; CH7; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0206; 06:57AM; 3711 N El Sereno Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/36nGb1H; El Sereno; Thirty firefighters extinguished the flames (primarily attic involvement) in 20 minutes, while protecting the adjacent structures from fire exposure. One patient was transported with burn injuries. Per protocol, fire investigators are en route to the scene. Cause under investigation. ; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC2 E1 E12 E16 E212 E47 RA2 RA47 RA801 T12; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0206; 06:37AM; 3711 N El Sereno Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/36nGb1H; El Sereno; One-story single-family home with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E1 E12 E16 E212 E47 RA2 RA47 RA801 T12; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0007; 12:07AM; 1888 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H7BHJg; Downtown; Crews arrived to find a one-story commercial (vacant medical) building with fire showing. Firefighters performed a defensive operation to fight the flames from the exterior of the structure. Ultimately, 70 firefighters extinguished the flames in 52 minutes (12:59am), without injury. Cause under investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E203 E209 E210 E215 E220 E227 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA209 RA3 RA810 SQ21 T10 T15 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14 15; Nicholas Prange
